DOC.brief_summary: First part 2 part study IRB protocol # , label ' A ' . Investigators hypothesize clinical muscle strength assessment ( manual muscle test ) predict ability protect airway swallow long-term ventilated subject . More specifically , investigator hypothesize low muscle strength associate inability clear secretion peri-laryngeal area ( valleculae pyriform sinus residue scale ( VPSR scale [ NRS : 0-4 ] > 1 ) enter material airway ( PAS scale [ 1-8 ] > 1 ) , predispose endotracheal aspiration .
